name: part_003
file: tmp_【#天音かなた2周年LIVE】無料 3DLIVE 「リベンジ」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Revenge＂【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [Dji-ehIz5_k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs the song 'Shumatsu Ryoko'.

subtitles.original: 明日世界は終わるんだって 昨日は眠れなくて
subtitles.english: "I heard the world ends tomorrow," I couldn't sleep last night.

subtitles.original: あぁ 小さな記憶の箱は 夜の海に浮かんでる
subtitles.english: Ah, a small box of memories floats on the night sea.

subtitles.original: 僕らを描いたあの絵の中に 吸い込まれるように
subtitles.english: As if being sucked into that painting that depicted us.

subtitles.original: 週末旅行を楽しもう
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy our weekend voyage,

subtitles.original: どうせ全部今日で終わるんだから
subtitles.english: since everything ends today anyway.

subtitles.original: 深夜東京の6畳半
subtitles.english: In a 6-tatami room in late-night Tokyo,

subtitles.original: 夢を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was dreaming.

subtitles.original: 灯りの灯らない蛍光灯
subtitles.english: Fluorescent lights that don't turn on,

subtitles.original: 明日には消えてる電脳城に
subtitles.english: in the cyber castle that will vanish tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 開幕戦打ち上げて いなくなんないよね
subtitles.english: Setting off the opening battle, you won't disappear, right?

subtitles.original: ここには誰もいない ここには誰もいない
subtitles.english: No one is here. No one is here.

subtitles.original: 深夜東京の6畳半 夢を見ていた
subtitles.english: In a 6-tatami room in late-night Tokyo, I was dreaming.

subtitles.original: 灯りの灯らない蛍光灯 明日には消えてる電脳城に
subtitles.english: Fluorescent lights that don't turn on, in the cyber castle that will vanish tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 開幕戦打ち上げて いなくなんないよね
subtitles.english: Setting off the opening battle, you won't disappear, right?

subtitles.original: ここには誰もいない ここには誰もいないから
subtitles.english: Because no one is here. Because no one is here.

subtitles.original: Party is over.
subtitles.english: Party is over.

subtitles.original: それでも踊りたかった
subtitles.english: Even so, I wanted to dance.

subtitles.original: 眠れないくらい
subtitles.english: Enough to keep me from sleeping.

subtitles.original: 情熱の火はいつしか いつの日にか
subtitles.english: The fire of passion will, before I know it, someday...

subtitles.original: はなから気付いている
subtitles.english: I've known from the start,

subtitles.original: 焔はいつか消える
subtitles.english: the flame will one day go out.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 何も要らないはずだったのに
subtitles.english: Hey, I wasn't supposed to need anything,

subtitles.original: まだ I'm so serious
subtitles.english: but I'm still so serious.

subtitles.original: あぁ あぁ 間に合う
subtitles.english: Ah, ah, I'll make it in time.

subtitles.original: Burn it up.
subtitles.english: Burn it up.

subtitles.original: Baby, Sorry darling そんなに甘くないよ
subtitles.english: Baby, Sorry darling, it's not that sweet.

subtitles.original: でもきっとそんなに悪くないよ
subtitles.english: But I'm sure it's not that bad.

subtitles.original: Give me fire.
subtitles.english: Give me fire.

subtitles.original: Light it up Baby 燃やしちゃおうぜ yeah
subtitles.english: Light it up Baby, let's burn it up, yeah.

subtitles.original:
火炎 
 作詞：薔薇園アヴ 作曲：薔薇園アヴ
subtitles.english:
FIRE 
 Lyrics: Barazono Avu Composition: Barazono Avu

subtitles.original: 燃えろよ 燃えろよ 炎よ 燃えろ
subtitles.english: Burn, burn, o flame, burn.

subtitles.original: 千代も八千代も 変わりもせずに
subtitles.english: For thousands of ages, without changing.

subtitles.original: 人のなりとかし全部 燃やせや ああ よしよし
subtitles.english: Melting all human form, burn it all, ah, there there.

subtitles.original: 出でよ 舞えよ 火の粉 焚き付けるのが仕事
subtitles.english: Come forth, dance, sparks, fanning the flames is the job.

subtitles.original: ガソリンとステロイド 燃える様はお見事
subtitles.english: Gasoline and steroids, the way it burns is magnificent.

subtitles.original: 火遊びはしない ぬるい真似はしない
subtitles.english: No playing with fire, no lukewarm acting.

subtitles.original: 無理、しけた火を ドラマ 燃やし尽くす マグマ ドラマ
subtitles.english: Impossible, a damp fire, drama, burning everything up, magma drama.

subtitles.original: この飽くなき渇き 青い炎みたい
subtitles.english: This insatiable thirst, like a blue flame.

subtitles.original: 死はひとつ隣 やがて総てひとつ隣
subtitles.english: Death is right next to you, soon everything will be right next to it.

subtitles.original: Love is dying.
subtitles.english: Love is dying.

subtitles.original: でもまだ消えてないから
subtitles.english: But it hasn't gone out yet.

subtitles.original: 忘れてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try and forget.

subtitles.original: 情熱の火はいつしか いつの日にか
subtitles.english: The fire of passion will, before I know it, someday...

subtitles.original: 身体は気付いている 僕らはいつか消える
subtitles.english: My body realizes, we will one day disappear.

subtitles.original: ゆるやかに若さを溶かして
subtitles.english: Gently melting away youth,

subtitles.original: 泣かないで Why so serious?
subtitles.english: don't cry, Why so serious?

subtitles.original: あぁ あぁ 間に合う
subtitles.english: Ah, ah, I'll make it in time.

subtitles.original: Burn it up.
subtitles.english: Burn it up.

subtitles.original: Baby, Sorry darling そんなに甘くないよ
subtitles.english: Baby, Sorry darling, it's not that sweet.

subtitles.original: でもきっとそんなに悪くないよ
subtitles.english: But I'm sure it's not that bad.

subtitles.original: Give me fire.
subtitles.english: Give me fire.

subtitles.original: Light it up Baby 燃やしちゃおうぜ yeah
subtitles.english: Light it up Baby, let's burn it up, yeah.
